paths.name: Beast Strength
paths.description: Unleash your inner beast with high-intensity strength training. Build explosive power and raw strength using functional movements that challenge your entire body.

heroes.name: The Wild Fighter
heroes.description: Feral Fury: Channel your inner primal strength.

heroes.name: The Cosmic Warrior
heroes.description: Limitless Power: Push your strength beyond the ordinary.

paths.name: Balanced Physique Training
paths.description: Achieve a lean and defined physique with workouts that focus on balance, tone, and endurance. Perfect for those seeking to sculpt their body while maintaining a regular, athletic shape.

heroes.name: The Shadow Runner
heroes.description: Endurance Unleashed: Build strength with lasting energy.

heroes.name: The Thunder Striker
heroes.description: Focused Energy: Core strength with a burst of speed.

paths.name: Focused Discipline
paths.description: Hone your focus and control with exercises designed to improve balance, precision, and inner strength. This path emphasizes breathing, core stability, and mental discipline.

heroes.name: The Water Warrior
heroes.description: Flow Precision: Move with balance and control.

heroes.name: The Silent Master
heroes.description: Calm Strength: Build focus and endurance with intent.

paths.name: Adventurer's Resilience
paths.description: Prepare for any challenge with training that builds endurance, flexibility, and mobility. Develop the resilience of a seasoned adventurer with a focus on longevity and recovery.

heroes.name: The Boundless Explorer
heroes.description: Energy Unlimited: Train for adaptability and stamina.

heroes.name: The Trailblazer
heroes.description: Grace in Motion: Strength with flexibility for every path.
